Header: Tons of waste material removed from the Kaduwela and Kolonnawa :Ministry of Provincial Councils and Local Government
Content: Ministry of Provincial Councils and Local Government said 150 tons of waste material from the recent floods have been removed from the Kaduwela and Kolonnawa Divisional Secretariats.. Secretary of the Ministry of Provincial Councils and Local Government, Kamal Padmasiri said plans have been made to remove all garbage over the next 3 days. Security forces together with the local government bodies launched the programme to remove waster material from the flood affected areas yesterday. Meanwhile the police said that travel will be limited once again from the section of road between Orugodawatte and Kaduwela on the Low level road from 9pm tonight to 5 am tomorrow due to the garbage removal procedures in the area after the recent floods.
